quoteText: OR AS TO THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF ANY INFORMATION OR CONTENT ACCESSIBLE FROM OR PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE BRAINLY SERVICES OR BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTIONS, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER ANY INFORMATION OR CONTENT IS MARKED AS “VERIFIED”.
title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "BRAINLY MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT THE BRAINLY SERVICES AND/OR ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, FUNCTIONALITY, INFORMATION, CONTENT OR OTHER MATERIALS AVAILABLE ON, THROUGH OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE BRAINLY SERVICES OR YOUR BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTION, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE MOBILE SOFTWARE, WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS . . . OR AS TO THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF ANY INFORMATION OR CONTENT ACCESSIBLE FROM OR PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE BRAINLY SERVICES OR BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTIONS, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER ANY INFORMATION OR CONTENT IS MARKED AS “VERIFIED”."
